Container.Name: mdict-live
Container.Overview:
MdictLive is a modern web-based MDict dictionary viewer with a React 19 SPA frontend. Look up words across multiple dictionaries simultaneously with instant search, dark mode, word frequency data, and a responsive design that preserves authentic dictionary styling.
Features: - React 19 SPA with dark mode, sidebar, wordbook - Supports MDict dictionaries (.mdx/.mdd) - Multi-dictionary simultaneous lookup - Word frequency database (COCA/BNC) - Multi-arch: amd64 and arm64
Homepage: https://mjshao.fun/work/mdict-live
